org.openbase.bco.psc.re.pointing

Class PostureHistory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.openbase.bco.psc.re.pointing.PostureHistory

  • public class PostureHistory
extends Object
    This class handles the history of a single posture up to a certain duration.
    Author:
    Thoren Huppke

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PostureHistory(long lookback)
      Constructor.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods

      void clear()
      Clears all the history data including the last posture.

      Gets the maximal duration in the lookback period during which the given thresholds hold for the given arm.

      Gets the last instance of the tracked posture.

      Gets the last base probability of a pointing gesture using the given arm.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PostureHistory

        public PostureHistory(long lookback)
        Constructor.
        Parameters:
        lookback - duration of posture history that is kept for future evaluation in milliseconds.

    • Method Detail

      • update

        public void update(long timestamp,
                   rst.tracking.TrackedPosture3DFloatType.TrackedPosture3DFloat posture,
                   double pointingProbabilityRight,
                   double pointingProbabilityLeft)
        Updates the history with new posture data.
        Parameters:
        timestamp - the time of the current observation of the posture.
        posture - the current instance of the posture.
        pointingProbabilityRight - the base probability of a pointing gesture using the right arm.
        pointingProbabilityLeft - the base probability of a pointing gesture using the left arm.

      • clear

        public void clear()
        Clears all the history data including the last posture.

      • getLastProbability

        public double getLastProbability(boolean right)
                          throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Gets the last base probability of a pointing gesture using the given arm.
        Parameters:
        right - if true, the base probability of a pointing gesture using the right arm is returned.
        Returns:
        the last base probability of a pointing gesture using the given arm.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown, if the history has not been updated since the last call of clear().

      • getLastPosture

        public rst.tracking.TrackedPosture3DFloatType.TrackedPosture3DFloat getLastPosture()
                                                                            throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Gets the last instance of the tracked posture.
        Returns:
        the last observed instance of the posture.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown, if the history has not been updated since the last call of clear().

      • getDuration

        public long getDuration(double probabilityThreshold,
                        double maxAngle,
                        boolean right)
                 throws org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException
        Gets the maximal duration in the lookback period during which the given thresholds hold for the given arm.
        Parameters:
        probabilityThreshold - minimal probability that should occur during the duration.
        maxAngle - maximal divergence in the direction angle, that can occur compared to the last posture.
        right - if true, the right arm is used, else the left one.
        Returns:
        The maximal duration in the lookback period during which the given thresholds hold for the given arm.
        Throws:
        org.openbase.jul.exception.NotAvailableException - is thrown, if the history has not been updated since the last call of clear().

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()
        Returns whether the history is empty.
        Returns:
        true, if the internal history is empty.
